summary.span: 提供表示 Windows 注册表中的根项的 对象，并提供访问项/值对的 方法。

span.span: Provides objects that represent the root keys in the Windows registry, and methods to access key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供在运行 Windows 的计算机上的注册表中找到的标准根密钥集。This class provides the set of standard root keys found in the registry on machines running Windows. 注册表是存储设备，用于提供有关应用程序、用户和默认系统设置的信息。The registry is a storage facility for information about applications, users, and default system settings. 例如，应用程序可以使用注册表存储需要在应用程序关闭后保留的信息，并在重新加载应用程序时访问相同的信息。For example, applications can use the registry for storing information that needs to be preserved after the application is closed, and access that same information when the application is reloaded. 例如，你可以存储颜色首选项、屏幕位置或窗口大小。For instance, you can store color preferences, screen locations, or the size of the window. 可以通过将信息存储在注册表中的不同位置来控制每个用户的此数据。You can control this data for each user by storing the information in a different location in the registry. 由类公开的基实例或根实例描绘了 `Registry` 注册表中子项和值的基本存储机制。The base, or root instances that are exposed by the `Registry` class delineate the basic storage mechanism for subkeys and values in the registry. 所有键都是只读的，因为注册表依赖于它们是否存在。All keys are read-only because the registry depends on their existence. 公开的密钥 `Registry` 为：The keys exposed by `Registry` are: 存储有关用户首选项的信息。 Stores information about user preferences. 存储本地计算机的配置信息。 Stores configuration information for the local machine. 存储有关类型 (和类) 及其属性的信息。 Stores information about types (and classes) and their properties. 存储有关默认用户配置的信息。 Stores information about the default user configuration. 存储软件组件的性能信息。 Stores performance information for software components. 存储非用户特定的硬件信息。 Stores non-user-specific hardware information. 存储动态数据。 Stores dynamic data. 确定要在其下存储/检索注册表信息的根密钥后，可以使用 类来添加或删除子项，并为给定键操作这些值。Once you have identified the root key under which you want to store/retrieve information from the registry, you can use the class to add or remove subkeys, and manipulate the values for a given key. 硬件设备可以使用即插即用接口在注册表中自动放置信息。Hardware devices can place information in the registry automatically using the Plug and Play interface. 用于安装设备驱动程序的软件可以通过写入标准 Api 将信息放入注册表。Software for installing device drivers can place information in the registry by writing to standard APIs. ## 用于获取和设置值的静态方法Static Methods for Getting and Setting Values 类还包含 `static` 用于设置和检索注册表项中的值的方法。The class also contains `static` and methods for setting and retrieving values from registry keys. 这些方法在每次使用注册表项时都将其打开和关闭，因此 当你访问大量值时，它们不会在类中执行和类似的方法。These methods open and close registry keys each time they are used, so they do not perform as well as analogous methods in the class, when you access a large number of values. 类还提供了一些方法，使用这些方法可以设置注册表项的 Windows 访问控制安全性，在检索值之前测试值的数据类型，并删除键。The class also provides methods that allow you to set Windows access control security for registry keys, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示了根键，第二个示例演示了 `static` 和 方法。The first example demonstrates root keys, and the second example demonstrates the `static` and methods. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何检索 HKEY_USERS 项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕上。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of the HKEY_USERS key, and print their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 `RegistryKey` 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in `RegistryKey` to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中，按其创建键，然后检索并显示这些值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 该示例演示了如何在 `defaultValue` 名称/值对不存在的情况下，存储和检索默认 (无名称) 名称/值对以及使用。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 定义文档的类型（或类）以及与那些类型关联的属性。

span.span: Defines the types (or classes) of documents and the properties associated with those types.

summary.span: 该字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传统应用程序和 OLE 应用程序都使用此项下存储的数据。Both conventional applications and OLE applications use data that is stored under this key. 此密钥还通过存储有关 DDE 和 OLE 支持的信息来提供与 Windows 3.1 注册数据库的向后兼容性。This key also provides backward compatibility with the Windows 3.1 registration database by storing information for DDE and OLE support. 文件查看器和用户界面扩展将其 OLE 类标识符存储在此注册表项中，并在此项中注册处理服务器。File viewers and user interface extensions store their OLE class identifiers in this key, and processing servers are registered in this key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.ClassesRoot Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 包含有关非用户特定的硬件的配置信息。

span.span: Contains configuration information pertaining to the hardware that is not specific to the user.

summary.span: 该字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员映射到中的子项 。This member is mapped to a subkey within . 使用此成员的一个示例是应用程序，该应用程序根据系统是否连接到网络，为其数据存储不同的服务器名称。An example of using this member is an application that stores a different server name for its data depending on whether the system is attached to a network. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentConfig Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 包含有关当前用户首选项的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the current user preferences.

summary.span: 此字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_CURRENT_USER。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_CURRENT_USER.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此注册表项中存储的信息包括环境变量和有关程序组、颜色、打印机、网络连接和应用程序首选项的数据的设置。Information stored in this key includes the settings of environment variables and data about program groups, colors, printers, network connections, and application preferences. 此密钥便于建立当前用户的设置。This key makes it easier to establish the current user's settings. 在此项中，软件供应商存储要在其应用程序中使用的当前用户特定首选项。In this key, software vendors store the current user-specific preferences to be used within their applications. 例如，microsoft 创建要使用的应用程序 HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft 密钥，每个应用程序在 Microsoft 密钥下创建其自己的子项。Microsoft, for example, creates the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft key for its applications to use, with each application creating its own subkey under the Microsoft key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.CurrentUser Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentUser Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.CurrentUser Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentUser Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.CurrentUser Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.CurrentUser Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The DynData registry key only works on Win9x, which is no longer supported by the CLR. On NT-based operating systems, use the PerformanceData registry key instead.")]
[<System.Obsolete("The DynData registry key only works on Win9x, which is no longer supported by the CLR. On NT-based operating systems, use the PerformanceData registry key instead.")>]

summary.span: 包含动态注册表数据。

span.span: Contains dynamic registry data.

summary.span: 该字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_DYN_DATA。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_DYN_DATA.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 98/Windows Me 注册表同时支持静态数据 (，该数据存储在注册表中的磁盘上) ，动态数据 (频繁更改，如性能统计信息) 。The Windows 98/Windows Me registry supports both static data (which is stored on disk in the registry) and dynamic data (which changes frequently, such as performance statistics). 此动态数据区域是一种机制，该机制允许 (Vxd) 的虚拟设备驱动程序向可在本地同时运行的 Win32 应用程序提供实时数据。This dynamic data area is the mechanism that allows Virtual Device Drivers (VxDs) to provide real-time data to Win32 applications that can run remotely as well as locally. 它还允许系统监视器提供远程 Windows 98/Windows Me 系统的性能统计信息。It also allows the system monitor to provide performance statistics on remote Windows 98/Windows Me systems. Vxd 并不仅限于性能数据。VxDs are not limited to performance data. 它们可以提供要在不独占 CPU 的情况下有效地从0环到环形3的任何数据。They can provide any data they want to pass from Ring 0 to Ring 3 efficiently without monopolizing the CPU. 注册表支持动态数据，方法是存储一个指向函数的指针，该函数将返回值 (或多个值) 。The registry supports dynamic data by storing a pointer to a function that returns a value (or many values). 当注册表调用查询与动态键关联的值时，将调用该函数以返回所需的值。When a Registry call queries values associated with a dynamic key, that function is called to return the desired value or values. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft Windows 95 中引入了动态密钥来处理动态注册表数据。Dynamic keys were introduced in Microsoft Windows 95 to handle dynamic Registry data. 它们仅在 Windows 98/Windows Me 中受支持。They are supported only in Windows 98/Windows Me. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. 请注意，此示例可能不返回任何结果，因为可能没有动态数据可用，或者您可能没有运行 Windows 98/ME。Note that this example can return no results, since there might not be dynamic data available, or you might not be running Windows 98/ME. 使用此密钥可能会导致其他系统出错。Using this key may cause an error on other systems. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.DynData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.DynData Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.DynData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.DynData Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.DynData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.DynData Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 操作系统不支持动态数据，即操作系统非 Windows 98、Windows 98 Second Edition 或 Windows Millennium Edition。

span.span: The operating system does not support dynamic data; that is, it is not Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition, or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me).

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue);
.method public static hidebysig object GetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue) cil managed

static member GetValue : string * string * obj -> obj
public static object? GetValue (string keyName, string? valueName, object? defaultValue);

param.name: keyName
param.span: 以有效注册表根（如“HKEY_CURRENT_USER”）开头的键的完整注册表路径。

span.span: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".
The name of the name/value pair.

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 当 不存在时返回的值。

span.span: The value to return if does not exist.

summary.span: 检索与指定的注册表项中的指定名称关联的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value associated with the specified name, in the specified registry key.

summary.span: 如果在指定的项中未找到该名称，则返回您提供的默认值；或者，如果指定的项不存在，则返回 。

span.span: If the name is not found in the specified key, returns a default value that you provide, or if the specified key does not exist.

returns.span: 如果由 指定的子项不存在，则返回 ；否则，返回与 关联的值；或者，如果未找到 ，则返回 。

span.span: if the subkey specified by does not exist; otherwise, the value associated with , or if is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串 `valueName` 不区分大小写。The string `valueName` is not case-sensitive. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以包含一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时，将显示 " (默认) " 字符串而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名值，请 `null` 为指定或空字符串 ( "" ) `valueName` 。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 有效的根名称为 HKEY_CURRENT_USER、HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE、HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT、HKEY_USERS、HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA、HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 和 HKEY_DYN_DATA。Valid root names are HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, and HKEY_DYN_DATA. 例如，在 Visual Basic 字符串 "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" 访问 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 根中子项 "MyTestKey" 的键/值对。For example, in Visual Basic the string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" accesses key/value pairs for the subkey "MyTestKey" in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER root. 当 方法检索 () 的可扩展字符串值时 ，它将使用本地环境中的数据展开环境字符串。When the method retrieves expandable string values (), it expands environment strings using data from the local environment. 如果包含对环境变量的可扩充引用的值存储为字符串 () ，而不是作为可扩充字符串 () ， 则不会将其展开。If a value containing expandable references to environment variables has been stored as a string (), rather than as an expandable string (), does not expand it. 您可以通过调用方法来扩展此类字符串 。You can expand such a string after it has been retrieved by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 从 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA 检索数据的建议方法是使用类，而不是 方法。The recommended way to retrieve data from HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA is to use the class rather than the method. 和 方法在每次使用注册表项时都将其打开和关闭，因此， 如果访问大量值，则和方法不会执行以及类的方法。The and methods open and close registry keys each time they are used, so they do not perform as well as the methods of the class if you access a large number of values. 还提供了一些方法，使你可以将访问控制列表 (ACL) 添加到注册表项，以便在检索值之前测试值的数据类型，并删除键。 also provides methods that allow you to add an access control list (ACL) to a registry key, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中，按其创建键，然后检索并显示这些值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 该示例演示了如何在 `defaultValue` 名称/值对不存在的情况下，存储和检索默认 (无名称) 名称/值对以及使用。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 该用户没有读取注册表项所需的权限。

span.span: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.

exception.span: 包含指定值的 已标记为删除。

span.span: The that contains the specified value has been marked for deletion.

exception.span: 未以有效注册表根开头。

span.span: does not begin with a valid registry root.

public: static initonly Microsoft::Win32::RegistryKey ^ LocalMachine;

summary.span: 包含本地计算机的配置数据。

span.span: Contains the configuration data for the local machine.

summary.span: 该字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LocalMachine` 包含五个密钥：`LocalMachine` contains five keys: 硬件描述了计算机的物理硬件、设备驱动程序使用该硬件的方式，以及将内核模式驱动程序与用户模式代码链接的映射和相关数据。Hardware Describes the physical hardware in the computer, the way device drivers use that hardware, and mappings and related data that link kernel-mode drivers with user-mode code. 每次系统启动时，都将重新创建此密钥中的所有数据。All data in this key is recreated each time the system is started. 说明子项描述了实际的计算机硬件。The Description subkey describes the actual computer hardware. DeviceMap 子项包含特定于特定类驱动程序的格式的杂项数据。The DeviceMap subkey contains miscellaneous data in formats specific to particular classes of drivers. Windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcemap 子项说明哪些设备驱动程序声明了哪些硬件资源。The ResourceMap subkey describes which device drivers claim which hardware resources. (Winmsdp.exe) 的 Windows NT 诊断程序，可以以易于阅读的形式报告其内容。The Windows NT Diagnostics program (Winmsdp.exe) can report on its contents in an easy-to-read form. SAM 是用户和组帐户的安全信息目录服务数据库，而对于 Windows 2000 Server (SAM 中的域，它是安全帐户管理器（称为目录服务数据库) ）。SAM The directory services database of security information for user and group accounts, and for the domains in Windows 2000 Server (SAM is the Security Account Manager, known as the directory services database). Security 包含本地安全策略，如特定的用户权限。Security Contains the local security policy, such as specific user rights. 此密钥仅由 Windows 2000 安全子系统使用。This key is used only by the Windows 2000 security subsystem. 软件每台计算机的软件数据库。Software The per-computer software database. 此密钥包含与本地计算机上安装的软件有关的数据，以及各种不同的配置数据。This key contains data about software installed on the local computer, along with various items of miscellaneous configuration data. 系统控制系统启动、设备驱动程序加载、Windows 2000 服务和操作系统行为。System Controls system startup, device driver loading, Windows 2000 services, and operating system behavior. 按照约定，如果在 和下存在类似数据 ，则中的数据 优先。By convention, if similar data exists under and under , the data in takes precedence. 但是，此键中的值还可以扩展 (而不是替换 Registry 中) 的数据。However, values in this key can also extend (rather than replace) data in Registry.LocalMachine. 此外，某些项 (如设备驱动程序加载项) 在 Registry 之外发生时无意义。Also, some items (such as device driver loading entries) are meaningless if they occur outside of Registry.LocalMachine. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.LocalMachine Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.LocalMachine Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.LocalMachine Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.LocalMachine Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.LocalMachine Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.LocalMachine Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey PerformanceData;
.field public static initonly class Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey PerformanceData
Public Shared ReadOnly PerformanceData As RegistryKey
public: static initonly Microsoft::Win32::RegistryKey ^ PerformanceData;
staticval mutable PerformanceData : Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey

summary.span: 包含软件组件的性能信息。

span.span: Contains performance information for software components.

summary.span: 该字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个软件组件都为其对象创建了密钥，安装了计数器，并在执行时写入计数器数据。Each software component creates keys for its objects, counters when it is installed, and writes counter data while it is executing. 你可以像访问任何其他注册表数据一样使用函数访问此数据 。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data, using the functions. 尽管你使用注册表来收集性能数据，但数据并不存储在注册表数据库中。Although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 改为通过此密钥访问注册表会导致系统从相应的系统对象管理器收集数据。Instead, accessing the registry with this key causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers. 若要从本地系统获取性能数据，请使用 方法，并使用 PerformanceData 键。To obtain performance data from the local system, use the method, with the Registry.PerformanceData key. 第一次调用会打开密钥， (您无需首先显式打开密钥) 。The first call opens the key (you do not need to explicitly open the key first). 但是，请务必在 完成获取性能数据后，使用方法关闭密钥的句柄。However, be sure to use the method to close the handle to the key when you are finished obtaining performance data. 如果软件组件的性能数据正在使用中，则用户无法安装或删除该软件组件。The user cannot install or remove a software component while its performance data is in use. 若要从远程系统中获取性能数据，您必须使用 方法，同时使用远程系统的计算机名称和 PerformanceData 密钥。To obtain performance data from a remote system, you must use the method, with the computer name of the remote system and the Registry.PerformanceData key. 此调用检索表示远程系统的性能数据的键。This call retrieves a key representing the performance data for the remote system. 若要检索数据，请 使用此键（而不是 PerformanceData 键）调用。To retrieve the data, call using this key, rather than the Registry.PerformanceData key. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 上，用户至少必须属于性能监视器用户组才能访问此基准密钥的子项。On Windows Server 2003, a user must at least belong to the Performance Monitor Users group in order to access subkeys of this base key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. 请注意，此示例通常不会返回任何结果，因为可能没有性能数据。Note that this example can often return no results, since there might be no performance data. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.PerformanceData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.PerformanceData Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.PerformanceData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.PerformanceData Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.PerformanceData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.PerformanceData Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 设置注册表项中的名称/值对的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a name/value pair in a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中，按其创建键，然后检索并显示这些值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 该示例演示了如何在 `defaultValue` 名称/值对不存在的情况下，存储和检索默认 (无名称) 名称/值对以及使用。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object value) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetValue (keyName As String, valueName As String, value As Object)
public: static void SetValue(System::String ^ keyName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ value);
static member SetValue : string * string * obj -> unit
public static void SetValue (string keyName, string? valueName, object value);

param.name: keyName
param.span: 以有效注册表根（如“HKEY_CURRENT_USER”）开头的键的完整注册表路径。

span.span: The full registry path of the key, beginning with a valid registry root, such as "HKEY_CURRENT_USER".
The name of the name/value pair.
The value to be stored.

summary.span: 设置指定的注册表项的指定名称/值对。

span.span: Sets the specified name/value pair on the specified registry key.

summary.span: 如果指定的项不存在，则创建该项。

span.span: If the specified key does not exist, it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4 开始， `valueName` 参数不再限制在最多255个字符之间; 但是，该 `keyName` 参数将继续具有255个字符的限制。Starting with the .NET Framework 4, the `valueName` parameter is no longer restricted to a maximum of 255 characters; however, the `keyName` parameter continues to have the 255-character restriction. 由于注册表中的每个键都可以存储许多值，因此必须使用 `valueName` 参数来指定要设置的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `valueName` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以包含一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时，将显示 " (默认) " 字符串而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名值，请 `null` 为指定或空字符串 ( "" ) `valueName` 。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 如果 `valueName` 密钥中不存在，则将创建它并将关联的值设置为 `value` 。If `valueName` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 如果 `keyName` 指定的子项不存在，则会在指定的根中创建该子项。If `keyName` specifies a subkey that does not exist, the subkey is created in the specified root. 例如，在 Visual Basic 字符串 "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" 会在 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 根创建子项 "MyTestKey"。For example, in Visual Basic the string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" creates the subkey "MyTestKey" in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER root. 字符串 "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3" 创建嵌套子项 "MyTestKey"、"MyTestKey\Key2" 和 "MyTestKey\Key2\Key3"。The string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3" creates the nested subkeys "MyTestKey", "MyTestKey\Key2", and "MyTestKey\Key2\Key3". 有效的根名称包括 HKEY_CURRENT_USER、HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE、HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT、HKEY_USERS、HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA、HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 和 HKEY_DYN_DATA。Valid root names include HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, and HKEY_DYN_DATA. > [!NOTE] > 方法打开一个注册表项，设置值，并在每次调用时关闭该密钥。The method opens a registry key, sets the value, and closes the key each time it is called. 如果需要修改大量值， 方法可以提供更好的性能。If you need to modify a large number of values, the method might provide better performance. 类还提供了一些方法，使你可以将访问控制列表 (ACL) 添加到注册表项，以便在检索值之前测试值的数据类型以及删除键。The class also provides methods that allow you to add an access control list (ACL) to a registry key, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. 此重载将 64 位整数存储为 () 的字符串 。This overload of stores 64-bit integers as strings (). 若要将64位数字存储为 值，请使用 方法重载。To store 64-bit numbers as values, use the method overload. 此重载将 所有字符串值存储为 对象，即使它们包含对环境变量的可展开引用。This overload of stores all string values as objects, even if they contain expandable references to environment variables. 若要将字符串值保存为 () 的可扩展字符串，请使用 方法重载。To save string values as expandable strings (), use the method overload. 此重载等效于 通过调用方法重载 。This overload is equivalent to calling the method overload with . > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) 上，注册表不是 Unicode，并且并非所有 Unicode 字符对于所有代码页都有效。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 对于当前代码页无效的 Unicode 字符被替换为最佳可用匹配项。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中，按其创建键，然后检索并显示这些值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 该示例演示了如何在 `defaultValue` 名称/值对不存在的情况下，存储和检索默认 (无名称) 名称/值对以及使用。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The user does not have the permissions required to create or modify registry keys.

span.span: Sets the name/value pair on the specified registry key, using the specified registry data type.

summary.span: 如果指定的项不存在，则创建该项。

span.span: If the specified key does not exist, it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4 开始， `valueName` 参数不再限制在最多255个字符之间; 但是，此 `keyName` 参数继续具有255个字符的限制。Starting with the .NET Framework 4, the `valueName` parameter is no longer restricted to a maximum of 255 characters; however, the `keyName` parameter continues have the 255-character restriction. 由于注册表中的每个键都可以存储许多值，因此必须使用 `valueName` 参数来指定要设置的特定值。Because many values can be stored in each key in the registry, you must use the `valueName` parameter to specify the particular value you want to set. > [!NOTE] > 注册表项可以包含一个不与任何名称关联的值。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示此未命名值时，将显示 " (默认) " 字符串而不是名称。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要设置此未命名值，请 `null` 为指定或空字符串 ( "" ) `valueName` 。To set this unnamed value, specify either `null` or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 如果 `valueName` 密钥中不存在，则将创建它并将关联的值设置为 `value` 。If `valueName` does not exist in the key, it is created and the associated value is set to `value`. 如果 `keyName` 指定的子项不存在，则会在指定的根中创建该子项。If `keyName` specifies a subkey that does not exist, the subkey is created in the specified root. 例如，在 Visual Basic 字符串 "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" 会在 HKEY_CURRENT_USER 根创建子项 "MyTestKey"。For example, in Visual Basic the string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey" creates the subkey "MyTestKey" in the HKEY_CURRENT_USER root. 字符串 "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3" 创建嵌套子项 "MyTestKey"、"MyTestKey\Key2" 和 "MyTestKey\Key2\Key3"。The string "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\MyTestKey\Key2\Key3" creates the nested subkeys "MyTestKey", "MyTestKey\Key2", and "MyTestKey\Key2\Key3". 有效的根名称包括 HKEY_CURRENT_USER、HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE、HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT、HKEY_USERS、HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA、HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG 和 HKEY_DYN_DATA。Valid root names include HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA, HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG, and HKEY_DYN_DATA. > [!NOTE] > 方法打开一个注册表项，设置值，并在每次调用时关闭该密钥。The method opens a registry key, sets the value, and closes the key each time it is called. 如果需要修改大量值， 方法可以提供更好的性能。If you need to modify a large number of values, the method might provide better performance. 类还提供了一些方法，使你可以将访问控制列表 (ACL) 添加到注册表项，以便在检索值之前测试值的数据类型以及删除键。The class also provides methods that allow you to add an access control list (ACL) to a registry key, to test the data type of a value before retrieving it, and to delete keys. 如果指定的类型与指定的不 `value` 匹配 `valueKind` ，并且不能转换数据， 则会引发。If the type of the specified `value` does not match the specified `valueKind`, and the data cannot be converted, is thrown. 例如，可以将存储 为 ，但前提是它的值小于的最大值 。For example, you can store a as a , but only if its value is less than the maximum value of a . 不能将单个字符串值存储为 。You cannot store a single string value as a . > [!NOTE] > 如果为或传递装箱值 ，则将使用固定区域性完成转换。If boxed values are passed for or , the conversion is done using the invariant culture. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me) 上，注册表不是 Unicode，并且并非所有 Unicode 字符对于所有代码页都有效。On Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), the registry is not Unicode, and not all Unicode characters are valid for all code pages. 对于当前代码页无效的 Unicode 字符被替换为最佳可用匹配项。A Unicode character that is invalid for the current code page is replaced by the best available match. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将多个数据类型的值存储在一个示例键中，按其创建键，然后检索并显示这些值。The following code example stores values of several data types in an example key, creating the key as it does so, and then retrieves and displays the values. 该示例演示了如何在 `defaultValue` 名称/值对不存在的情况下，存储和检索默认 (无名称) 名称/值对以及使用。The example demonstrates storing and retrieving the default (nameless) name/value pair, and the use of `defaultValue` when a name/value pair does not exist. [!code-cpp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Microsoft.Win32.Registry.GetSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey Users;
.field public static initonly class Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey Users
Public Shared ReadOnly Users As RegistryKey
public: static initonly Microsoft::Win32::RegistryKey ^ Users;
staticval mutable Users : Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey

summary.span: 包含有关默认用户配置的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the default user configuration.

summary.span: 该字段读取 Windows 注册表基项 HKEY_USERS。

span.span: This field reads the Windows registry base key HKEY_USERS.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此密钥包含计算机的每个用户的分支。This key contains a branch for each user of the computer. 为本地计算机上的新用户提供默认配置，如果用户未更改首选项，则为默认的当前用户提供默认配置。The default configuration is supplied for new users on the local computer and for the default current user if the user has not changed preferences. 由于 Windows 98/ME 还支持注册表，因此，应用程序可以访问用户特定的信息，其方式与在 Windows 2000 中相同。Because Windows 98/ME also supports Registry.Users, applications can access the user-specific information the same way they do under Windows 2000. 每个用户的信息存储在单独的文件中，该文件可以存储在本地或网络服务器上。Each user's information is stored in a separate file, which can be stored locally or on a network server. Windows 98/ME 可以将此文件复制到用户的当前系统，以便设置可以通过用户从一台计算机移动到另一台计算机。Windows 98/ME can copy this file to the user's current system so that settings can move from one computer to another with the user. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索此项的子项，并将其名称打印到屏幕。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the subkeys of this key, and prints their names to the screen. 使用 方法可以创建感兴趣的特定子项的实例。Use the method to create an instance of the particular subkey of interest. 然后，可以使用中的其他操作 来操作该密钥。You can then use other operations in to manipulate that key. [!code-cpp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Registry.Users Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Registry.Users Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
